description.name: Midhub
description.descriptionText: Midhub is an escrow system which empowers both freelancers and clients to make secure but fast transactions by live streaming their work. Checks are put in place so the funds can be released as soon as the client downloads the file uploaded by the freelancer. The need for a platform in which both parties can protect each other has been growing at a rapid pace for the last couple of years and that is why we're here today!

description.name: Midhub Backend
description.descriptionText: Midhub Backend is the server implementation of the original project "Midhub" that currently runs on nodejs. The reason for extracting this as separate piece is for demonstrational purposes on the steps that were taken and the reasoning behind these for creating the overall architecture and structure of the server

description.name: Cohesive
description.descriptionText: Cohesive is a IOS application written in Swift which brought students together depending on their educational needs. There are many times in which students urgently need each other's skills in order to complete assignments of any kind. By connecting them according to their abilities while these match another students' needs, this pairing was made succesfully. For example, if student A is good with math but needs help with english, and student B is good with english but needs help with math, these two would match

description.name: Portfolio
description.descriptionText: This is the current project you are interacting with at the moment. I have opened its source code to the public for demonstrational purposes. From the colors to the layout of the website have been seriously taken into account in order to achieve a clean and concise approach to transmiting information about who I am today and who I am planning to be in the future
